data.comment: The big names in today's match at St. Mary's Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Southampton.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Important block from the Sheffield defence as Stuart Armstrong fires in a strike for Southampton.
In the minute 3, Andy Madley signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
Can Southampton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
In the minute 7, Andy Madley blows against Southampton's Theo Walcott for offside.
Throw-in Southampton.
Che Adams (Southampton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 9, Oriol Romeu of Southampton gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
Ryan Bertrand for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andy Madley awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Southampton's Danny Ings gets in a shot on goal at St. Mary's Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 20, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Jannik Vestergaard's header is off-target for Southampton.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Oliver McBurnie for Sheffield who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Oliver McBurnie is back on the pitch.
In the minute 24, In Southampton, Danny Ings of Southampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Southampton.
Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 27, Southampton needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Sheffield's Enda Stevens has been booked in Southampton.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Andy Madley signals a throw-in for Sheffield, close to Southampton's area.
In the minute 32, Sheffield's Sander Berge gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Southampton.
In the minute 34, Goal! Che Adams gives Southampton a 1-0 lead in Southampton.
Jan Bednarek with an assist there.
In the minute 36, Andy Madley signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Andy Madley signals a Southampton throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Sheffield in the half of Southampton.
Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in Southampton.
Southampton drive upfield and Stuart Armstrong gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
In the minute 39, James Ward-Prowse gets his shot on target but fails to score for Southampton.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Sheffield.
In the minute 43, In Southampton Southampton attack through Kyle Walker-Peters. The finish is off target, however.
Andy Madley awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Throw-in Sheffield.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, Andy Madley blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Andy Madley signals a Sheffield throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Southampton.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 48, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
David McGoldrick is replacing Oliver McBurnie for Sheffield at St. Mary's Stadium.
In the minute 49, Sheffield needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 52, John Egan (Sheffield) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Southampton goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Southampton's Danny Ings has run offside.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Southampton's half?
Southampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Sheffield in Southampton.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
In the minute 57, Andy Madley signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Sheffield's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Southampton close to the penalty box.
Danny Ings for Southampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Sheffield at St. Mary's Stadium.
Sheffield to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
The away team replace Billy Sharp with Rhian Brewster.
In the minute 62, Great finish from Stuart Armstrong to give Southampton a 2-0 lead.
Great play from Danny Ings to set up the goal.
Andy Madley awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Southampton.
Southampton's James Ward-Prowse breaks free at St. Mary's Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Southampton.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
The away team have replaced Chris Basham with Lys Mousset. This is the third substitution made today by Chris Wilder.
In the minute 72, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Andy Madley.
Andy Madley signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Sheffield's area.
Southampton are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Southampton.
Jannik Vestergaard (Southampton) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Andy Madley awards Sheffield a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Southampton pushes forward through Danny Ings, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Sheffield awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Sheffield's Sander Berge misses with an attempt on goal.
Southampton have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Ralph Hasenhuttl is making the team's first substitution at St. Mary's Stadium with Nathan Redmond replacing Theo Walcott.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Andy Madley signals a Sheffield throw-in in Southampton's half.
In the minute 81, Andy Madley awards the away team a throw-in.
In Southampton a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Southampton capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 83, Goal! Nathan Redmond extends Southampton's lead to 3-0.
That's a fine assist from Oriol Romeu.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Ralph Hasenhuttl (Southampton) is making a second substitution, with Daniel N`Lundulu replacing Che Adams.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andy Madley signals a free kick to Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ibrahima Diallo is on a sub for Oriol Romeu for Southampton.
Throw-in for Southampton at St. Mary's Stadium.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 89, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Southampton.
Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-0.
